title: Go 1.3 error in encoding/csv
body:
by **zain@hedgechart.com**: 
I have some code that ran correctly in Go 1.2 but no longer works in Go 1.3. This code
reads a csv file.

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. Run this (since it makes an http Get request, run it locally):
http://play.golang.org/p/ww_dFCajeS

What happened?
In, 
go version go1.3 darwin/amd64

we get an error:
err=line 498, column 0: wrong number of fields in line

What should have happened instead?
In,
go version go1.2.1 darwin/amd64

we get the correct output:
len(records)=501


Please provide any additional information below.
This error occurs for a couple of other files I've tried reading as well but at
different lines for the different files.
Nothing in the release notes for Go 1.3 suggest that this should be happening.
Attachments: 1. csv_error.go (1008 bytes)
